column5: After watching the forum silently for the past 3 months I decided to join, I am a active fishman and hunter. As a young boy (not too long ago) I quickly fell in love with hiking the small creeks and rivers of Ontario in search of browns and brookies and pinning for fall and spring steelhead. I hope to gain lots of knowledge as a young fisherman, from the many wise and respected fishermen/women on this forum.   Evan.
welcome to OFC bud. you'll find the community here more than willing to help you out in regards to fishing and many other things aswell.

Welcome aboard! You've come to the right place and I can guarantee this site will make you a better fisherman. And to get the full experience, you must be an active member and if you are lucky? Hook up and fish with our knowledgeable fisherman.Enjoy!
Welcome to the board, you'll learn lots from the knowlegable members.  I get my morning fix by reading this board everyday!!
Welcome to the board...   Flattery will get you everywhere...
